description_html:
Inspired by the simplicity of Nordic design, Duravit’s new Luv collection merges subtlety with elegance. The Scandinavian-inspired series of washbasins, bathtubs, and bathroom furniture was designed by Cecilie Manz, who envisioned a “bowl filled with water on a simple table” to create the collection’s signature shape.

The washbasins and bathtubs are equally modern and timeless, matching the trends of today and the classics of tomorrow thanks to a signature oval-shape. Luv’s washbasins and tubs showcase Duravit’s innovation and material expertise, with two proprietary materials used. The Luv washbasins are made from DuraCeram®, making them equally resilient and luxurious, and are perfected with generous inner basins and clean edges. The Luv bathtubs are seamlessly made from DuraSolid A, which gives the tubs a warm to the touch feel with a high-quality matte look.

Luv’s color palette of matte lacquers and soft glazes was developed exclusively for this collection. The washbasin is available in a variety of neutral shades - including soft white, grey, and sand - that complement the graceful, refined aesthetic of the series.
